title: 3,000 Years Of Impeachment, Atone For Your Bone With Your Phone 09.27.22
itunes:title: 3,000 Years Of Impeachment, Atone For Your Bone With Your Phone 09.27.22
description:
In episode 1339, Jack and Miles are joined by host of Life as a Gringo, DJ Dramos, to discuss… Three Thousand Years of Bad Faith Impeachments of Joe Biden, DeSantis’ Martha’s Vineyard Circus Is Not Playing Out the Way He Wanted, Churches Are Using “Shameware” Apps Designed By A Former NSA Employee and more!

  1. Three Thousand Years of Bad Faith Impeachments of Joe Biden
  2. DeSantis’ Martha’s Vineyard Circus Is Not Playing Out the Way He Wanted
  3. Mysteries, legal challenges follow Fla. Gov. Ron DeSantins's migrant flights
  4. Churches Are Using “Shameware” Apps Designed By A Former NSA Employee
  5. The Ungodly Surveillance of Anti-Porn ‘Shameware’ Apps

LISTEN: Tomorrow (BADBADNOTGOOD Remix) by Brittany Howard

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
